fr.dudie.nominatim.client.request

Class NominatimSearchRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dudie.nominatim.client.request.NominatimRequest
      • fr.dudie.nominatim.client.request.NominatimSearchRequest

  • public class NominatimSearchRequest
extends NominatimRequest
    Holds request parameters for a search request.

    Attributes documentation was extracted from Nominatim Wiki page on October 26th, 2013.

    Author:
    Jeremie Huchet

      • setAcceptLanguage

        public void setAcceptLanguage(String acceptLanguage)

        Parameters:

      • getCountryCodes

        the country codes

      • setCountryCodes

        public void setCountryCodes(List<String> countryCodes)
        Limit search results to a specific country (or a list of countries). <countrycode> should be the ISO 3166-1alpha2 code, e.g. gb for the United Kingdom, de for Germany, etc.
        Parameters:
        countryCodes - the country codes to set

      • addCountryCode

        public void addCountryCode(String countryCode)
        Limit search results to a specific country (or a list of countries). <countrycode> should be the ISO 3166-1alpha2 code, e.g. gb for the United Kingdom, de for Germany, etc.
        Parameters:
        countryCode - the country code to add

      • getBounded

        public Boolean getBounded()
        Gets whether or not the results will be bounded to the given viewBox.
        Returns:
        the bounded

      • setBounded

        public void setBounded(boolean bounded)
        Setting true will restrict the results to only items contained with the bounding box.
        Restricting the results to the bounding box also enables searching by amenity only.
        For example a search query of just "[pub]" would normally be rejected but with bounded=1 will result in a list of items matching within the bounding box.
        Parameters:
        bounded - the bounded to set

      • getAddress

        public boolean getAddress()
        When true, include a breakdown of the address into elements.
        Returns:
        the address

      • setAddress

        public void setAddress(boolean address)
        Include a breakdown of the address into elements.
        Parameters:
        address - the address to set

      • getName

        public Boolean getName()
        When true, include a list of alternative names in the results.
        Returns:
        whether or not the alternative names should be included in the results

      • setName

        public void setName(Boolean name)
        When true, include a list of alternative names in the results.
        Parameters:
        name - true to include a list of alternative names in the results

      • setExcludePlaceIds

        public void setExcludePlaceIds(List<String> excludePlaceIds)
        If you do not want certain openstreetmap objects to appear in the search result, give a list of the place_id's you want to skip.
        Parameters:
        excludePlaceIds - the excluded place ids to set
